entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The email discusses potential candidates for a specific role or position, expressing agreement with previously mentioned suggestions by Tim. The individuals considered suitable for this role include Jon Atack, Reuben Somsen, Kanzure, and Roasbeef. Each of these candidates is believed to bring unique strengths and capabilities that would contribute positively to the position in question. The endorsement of these candidates highlights their perceived competence and suitability, suggesting that their involvement would be beneficial. This recommendation reflects a thoughtful consideration of each candidate's skills and potential impact, indicating a strategic approach to selecting individuals who can contribute effectively to the goals at hand.
